questions.QuestionText: Which document formally authorizes the existence of a project?
questions.Explenation: The Project Charter formally authorizes the existence of a project and provides the project manager with the authority to apply organizational resources, as described in PMBOK Guide, Section 4.1.

questions.QuestionText: What is the main purpose of stakeholder engagement in a project?

Choices.choicetext: To ensure stakeholders are satisfied and project objectives are met

questions.Explenation: The main purpose of stakeholder engagement is to ensure stakeholders are appropriately involved, their needs and expectations understood, conflicts managed, and project goals achieved (PMBOK Guide, Section 13.1).
